resources.string: Are you sure you want to delete this recording?
This is a call recording from my phone
There are no recordings in this phone.\nTo enable recording select \"Enable recording\" from the menu.
Are you sure you want to delete all of your recordings?
The phone is now on a call
If recording was enabled, recording should have started, if not you can enable recording in the application, the phone will stop the recording when the conversation ends
Unfortunately, it is not possible to record calls on this device. (Usually because another application/service is using the microphone in the background)
The selected storage location is read-only.\nNew calls will not be recorded!

The selected storage location is not readable.

Welcome to Call Recorder!

Results may vary. Manufacturers are often known to break call recording functionality on their devices, and there isn\'t a whole lot I can do about it.

Check local laws regarding recording of telephone conversations. Some localities may ban the recording of telephone conversations, or may require both parties to be informed of the recording first. Also, if you are talking to someone in a different locality their recording laws may apply to you.
